description: Scalar energy head + IRED contrastive loss: softplus(E_pos - E_neg). Tests whether scalar head fixes the gradient collapse that killed q206.
notes: Key experiment: scalar energy head + contrastive loss. With E=g(h) instead of ||fc4(h)||^2, pushing E_pos down no longer collapses the gradient field. Expect: pred nonzero and growing, MSE improves below 1.0, margin positive. Same Langevin + replay as q206 but with scalar energy. energy_reg_weight=0 per literature recommendation.
